overview: Dance Dosti Aur Ishqool is a Hindi movie released on 24 July, 2015. The movie is directed by Raju Soni and featured Nayan Bhatt, Samarth Chaturvedi and Ramesh Goyal as lead characters. Other popular actors who were roped in for Dance Dosti Aur Ishqool are Asmita Joglekar and Sanjay Kanoujiya.
title: Dance Dosti Aur Ishqool
